name: RameshArvindSkill
0:
”Alexa, launch ramesh aravind”
”Alexa, give motivation talks from ramesh aravind”
”Alexa, give inspiring talks from ramesh aravind”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ramesh aravind
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ramesh Aravind is an Indian actor, director, television presenter, screenwriter, and motivational speaker. He shares his valuable life lessons and tips by using the power of his experience, quality education and community contributions. In this Alexa skill he shares his life lessons motivating and inspiring one and all, especially the youth. These lessons are valuable for the youth to grow professionally and get better everyday. This is a personality development skill aiming to improve your soft skills, like communication, critical thinking, ability to listen.build confidence through positive thoughts.

Ramesh Aravind has earned and been nominated for numerous awards during his career, including winning two Filmfare Awards for Best Actor and Karnataka State Awards for Best Actor and Best Story for his script in Hoomale, as well as Udaya TV and Suvarna TV Awards. He is appointed by (BBMP) Greater Bangalore Civic body as awareness ambassador for COVID-19. 
The talks are mainly in Kannada Language mixed with English. Please come back and use the skill often to listen to new content from Ramesh Aravind.
